game.name: Assetto Corsa
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, VR Supported, Partial Controller Support, Steam Leaderboards, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 아세토 코르사(Assetto Corsa) v1.16은 새로운 레이저 스캔 트랙 "라구나 세카(Laguna Seca)" 및 기다리던 Alfa Romeo Giulia Quadrifoglio를 포함한 7개의 신차를 소개합니다! 체인지로그에서 더 자세한 내용을 확인하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Assetto Corsa v1.16 introduces the new "Laguna Seca" laser-scanned track, 7 new cars among which the eagerly awaited Alfa Romeo Giulia Quadrifoglio! Check the changelog for further info!

reviewHighlights.text: I am not sure. It's annoy that you need so many third parties programs to make it work for gamepad/controller? I might be wrong here. The game itself...
One of the best driving simulators available on PC, featuring truly remarkable steering wheel and force feedback support. The menus are unintuitive an...
